#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<map>
#include<string>
std::map<std::string,int> no;
int main()
{
    int x,y,i;
    std::string s;
    scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
    while(x&&y)
    {
               no.clear();
               int a[20002]={0};
               for(i=0;i<x;i++)
               {
                               std::cin>>s;
                               a[no[s]++]--;
                               a[no[s]]++;
               }
               for(i=1;i<=x;i++)
               {
                               printf("%d\n",a[i]);
               }
               scanf("%d %d",&x,&y);
    }
    return 0;
              
}
